item.title: About
item.description: This is me, i’m an informatics student at the Univesity of Ghent. I have a certain need to structure what I do and I can’t find the thing that works for me. This is an attempt to try to write some stuff I do down in a blog. It doens’t have a goal of entertaining, it is mostly for myself but everyone else who can get anything usefull out of it, good luck!

item.title: My bike revisement
item.description: The start The plan Execution 17⁄12 After lunch i tried to get the crack arm of with new gathered energy. I quickly noticed that poping it off using a hammer and long piece of steel was not going to work. It wasn’t moving at all and because off the lack of a bike stand or other tools to keep the frame fixed I couldn’t get the proper force onto the cranckarm needed to push it off.
